title: Theme Center Patch
author: BlassGO
description: Magisk module to apply themes for Infinite Time. All Samsung devices. (Android 10+)

title: Bootanimation Maker
author: BlassGO
description: Magisk module to change the Bootanimation of any Android device using a VIDEO or GIF. The bootanimations adapt to the screen size of each device.

title: Bootlogo Changer - Exynos
author: BlassGO
description: Magisk module to change the Bootlogo (and more) of any Samsung device with Exynos. The images are adapted to the resolution of the originals of each device.

title: SetupWizard Pass
author: BlassGO, Zonik
description: Force a full pass of the SetupWizard.

title: FlagSecure Disabler
author: BlassGO
description: Unlock screenshots in apps that don't allow it.

title: VolumeUP Action
author: BlassGO
description: Reboot into Recovery mode by pressing Vol+ during Bootanimation.
